entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
